sys_script.name: validate Start and End date

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_573546_lms_leave_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>validate Start and End date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	
	var now =new GlideDateTime();
	
	var startDate = new GlideDateTime(current.start_date);
	var endDate = new GlideDateTime(current.end_date);
	
	if (startDate.before(now)){
		gs.addErrorMessage("Start date cannot be in the past.  Your request has not been saved to the database.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
if (endDate.before(startDate)){
		gs.addErrorMessage("End date cannot be before start date.  Your request has not been saved to the database.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-09 09:50:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7ff2dbd42f1660102d2e8d1df699b6a7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validate Start and End date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_573546_lms">1f543e832f4e20102d2e8d1df699b62c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">1f543e832f4e20102d2e8d1df699b62c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7ff2dbd42f1660102d2e8d1df699b6a7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-11 14:25:03</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7ff2dbd42f1660102d2e8d1df699b6a7"/></record_update>
